entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in 7.0.200 when using UnscopedRef on a property #67697
  • C# Compiler `csc -langversion:?` cann't run on macOS #67692
  • [LSP pull diagnostics] Ordering semantics for open document/project processing for background analysis #67687

Closed

  • resx incorrect comment placement #67366
    17.7
  • Remove AnalyzerExecutor.CancellationToken property #67670
  • Compiler can't find System.Collections.Immutable 6.0.0 #67668
  • StateSet.ContainsAnyDocumentOrProjectDiagnostics heavy allocator #22609
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33606.396 #67686

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish packages for PR val builds for 17.6 branch #67702
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support using the OOP server from the preview workspace #67701
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #67700
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support attributes on primary constructors #67695
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors, 17.7
  • Do not offer to simplify `if` statement to conditional expressions if both assignments are discards #67693
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid realizing locations array when finding the symbol found in a particular location. #67691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache exceptions thrown by DiagnosticDescriptor to avoid excessive string allocations #67690
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Add assertion to detect misbehaving completion with complex edit #67685
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Lower the priority of the view tagging we do outside the bounds of the visible region of hte file. #67698
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Publish packages for PR val builds #67682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2152718 #67688
  • Adjust comment for CompilerAnalyzerThrows in resx file #67589
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove AnalyzerExecutor.CancellationToken property #67694
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67689
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move tagging and classification over to using SegmentedLists from ArrayBuilders. #67680
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update compiler tool set to 4.5.0 #67683
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust solution crawler logic to choose next best project to reduce expensive allocations #67666
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Switch all usages of Locations[0] to GetFirstLocation() #67678
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Null coalescing assignment for nullable value type should set state of nullable type not underlying type #67468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce number of invocations to StateSet.GetOrCreateActiveFileState #67669
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [17.6] Only send workspace/configuration request when client supports that #67639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
